SENT.plain: The authors report a new case of "sub optic" course of anterior cerebral arteries with an anterior communicating artery aneurysm controlled at surgery
The patient had also a distal Moya Moya, a median artery of the corpus callosum and an aortic coarctation
He underwent a first operation for cerebral aneurysm and in a second step another for aortic malformation
The authors discuss the anomaly by the way of Lasjaunia's embryologic scheme of ophthalmic arteries formation
